# lineThrough

**Type Property**

A decoration representing a line through the text.

## Declaration

```swift
static var lineThrough: AVCaption.Decoration { get }
```

## Decorations

- **underline**: A decoration representing a line under the text.
- **overline**: A decoration representing a line over the text.

items.description: A decoration representing a line under the text.
